select
c.nombre as c_nombre, c.documento as c_documento, c.telefono as c_telefono, c.direccion as c_direccion, c.email as c_email, c.vetado as c_vetado,
ir.id, ir.fechainiciorenta , ir.fechafinrenta ,
i.id as i_id, i.nombre as i_nombre, i.descripcion as i_descrpcion, i.fechalanzamiento as i_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia as i_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as i_formatorenta, i.genero as i_genero,
ti.id as ti_id, ti.descripcion as ti_descripcion
FROM VI_CLIENTES as c left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento left join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id;
